Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1964...
Injured on 6/10/1964 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/21/1965 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 8/19/1965 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 9/3/1967 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/1/1968 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/12/1969, off Gene Carr (PG)...
Earned first career win on 5/12/1969...
Injured on 7/12/1969 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1971, winning 2 games with a 0.56 ERA...
Hit first career homerun on 7/10/1971, off John Fletcher (NJ)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1973, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1973, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Injured on 5/1/1974 with a Inflamed Bicep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/3/1975 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Boston (UBA) on 7/21/1975 (Going to PIL: P T. Fierros. Going to SHP: CF O. Talavera)...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1977, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Bay City on 1/31/1979 (Going to PIL: P E. Regalado, 1B J. Dugas. Going to BC: P T. Fierros, RF M. Fagenson)...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/2/1982 to a 1-year deal worth $1,875,000 per year...
